value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Lord Sigurd, descendant of Baldr
of the 12 crusaders... You wield
a strength not many command.$k$pPlease, lend me that strength and
help me defeat the enemy within
this Tempest.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|This enemy...who is it, Prince Marth?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Our foe, the root of this chaos...$k$pIt's you, Lord Sigurd.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|...Impossible!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|He is a Sigurd from another world,
trapped in an unending nightmare.$k$pIf we defeat him, he will be released
from his terrible prison...and this
chaos will end.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Then I must face myself... That is no
easy thing to stomach, even if he is
from another world.$k$pBut if this other Sigurd is the root
of this chaos, I will do what I must
to sever that root.$k$pI am with you, Prince Marth.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Thank you, Lord Sigurd. Together, we
won't lose. You have a strength the
other Sigurd lacks; the strength of—$k$p$WmMPID_キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Normal,Face|Sigurd! You're all right!$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Prince Quan! Where did you—$k$p$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|It has been too long, Sigurd.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Eldigan! You're here too?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|They will join us. Together, we will
break through this chaos.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|My friends...the path ahead is
treacherous. You need not burden
yourselves by joining this fight.$k$p$WmMPID_キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Normal,Face|What burden, Sigurd? We made a
promise back at the academy in
Belhalla, if you recall.$k$p$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|We vowed to always come to the aid
of one another, no matter the cost.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Yes, I remember... Such dearly held
memories are not easily forgotten.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|These bonds you share will be the
strength we'll need in the battles to
come. Now, let us face our foe...$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The chaos of the Tempest has
broken... Thank you, Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|With the Tempest dispersing,
everything will return to normal.$k$pAs for me, that means...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|...I'm sorry, Lord Sigurd. You were
summoned as a Hero after your life
was taken from you.$k$pAnd as for your companions...$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Eldigan... Quan... My dear friends.
Please forgive me.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|It's true that each of you suffered an
untimely death...$k$pBut though you can't return to life,
your noble souls were not lost.$k$pThe light you three carried was
inherited by your children...$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Seliph, my son...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I know of the future, and I can tell
you, at the very least, it is bright.$k$pKnow that the children you each left
behind find victory, and they build a
world where all can live in peace.$k$pThat is the future you left for them...
and each grows to be a legendary
Hero in their own right.$k$p
